# ggmice

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`ggmice` is an `R` package which enhances the imputation package `mice` with `ggplot2` visualizations.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ggmice from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("amices/ggmice")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
# library(ggmice)
## basic example code
```
